revision.text:
__NOTOC__ This is the 'Task' form; edit the page to see the source code. You can add data with this form [[Special:AddPage/Task|here]]. {{{info|add title=Add Task|edit title=Edit Task}}} = Task Information = {{{for template|Task}}}

Target date: {{{field|target_date|default=Now}}}

Date Completed: {{{field|completion_date}}}

Status: {{{field|status|default=New}}}

Priority: {{{field|priority|default=2}}}

% Complete: {{{field|completeness|default=0}}}

Assigned to: {{{field|assigned to|list|autocomplete on namespace=User}}}

Projects: {{{field|projects|list|autocomplete on=Project}}}

Tags: {{{field|tags}}}

= Time Tracking =

Estimated Person-Days: {{{field|estimated}}}

Person-Days Remaining: {{{field|remaining}}}

Total Actual Person-Days: {{{field|actual}}}

= Relations =

Associated Websites: {{{field|websites|list|autocomplete on=Website}}}

Category: {{{field|category|autocomplete on namespace=Category}}}

Contacts: {{{field|contacts|list|autocomplete on=Contact}}}

= Reminders =

Remind me {{{field|reminder|default=20,15,7,3}}} days before Target date

{{{end template}}} '''Details:''' {{{field|free text}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

{{#forminput:Task|35||Add/Edit Task/Status|}}
[[Has default form::Form:Task| ]]

__NOTOC__ = Dashboard =
{{#forminput:Task|35||Add Task|Task[assigned to]={{{1|{{PAGENAME}}}}} }}
{{#semantic_calendar: Target date |[[Category:Task]][[Status::New||In Progress]][[Assigned to::{{{1|{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAME}}}}}]] }} = Past Due = {{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Assigned to::{{{1|{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAME}}}}}]] [[Status::New||In Progress]] [[Target date::<{{CURRENTTIMESTAMP}}]] [[Status::*]] [[Target date::*]] | sort=Target_date | default=Nothing to see here. Nice goin', chief. }} = Open Tasks = {{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Assigned to::{{{1|{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAME}}}}}]] [[Status::New||In Progress]] [[Status::*]] [[Target date::*]] | sort=Target_date }} = Deferred Tasks = {{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Assigned to::{{{1|{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAME}}}}}]] [[Status::Deferred]] [[Status::*]] [[Target date::*]] | sort=Target_date }} = Completed Tasks = {{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Assigned to::{{{1|{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAME}}}}}]] [[Status::Completed]] [[Status::*]] [[Target date::*]] | sort=Target_date }}

<noinclude>
This is the 'Project' form; edit the page to see the source code. You can add data with this form [[Special:AddPage/Project|here]].
</noinclude>
<includeonly>
{{{info|add title=Add Project|edit title=Edit Project}}}

{{{for template|Project}}}
'''Category:''' {{{field|category|autocomplete on namespace=Category|list}}}
{{{end template}}}

{{{for template|Website Widget|label=Website URLS|multiple}}}
'''URL:''' {{{field|1|autocomplete on=Website}}}
{{{end template}}}

== Additional Information ==
{{{field|free text}}}

</includeonly>

This is the 'Project' template. It should be called in the following format: 
  {{{Project|
     category=XXX
  }}}
Edit the page to see the template text.
{{#forminput:Task|35||Add New Task|super_page={{PAGENAME}}&Task[projects]={{PAGENAME}}&Task[category]={{ #if: {{{category|}}} | {{{category}}} | }} }}
'''Category:''' {{ #if: {{{category|}}} | {{#arraymap:{{{category}}}|,|x|[[Category:x]] [[x]]}} | (none) }} '''Total Estimated Person-Days:''' [[Estimated_days::{{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Belongs to project::{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Estimated_days::+]] [[Estimated_days::*]]| format=sum| }}]] '''Total Estimated Person-Days Remaining:''' [[Days_to_complete::{{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Belongs to project::{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Days_to_complete::+]] [[Days_to_complete::*]]| format=sum| }}]] '''Total Actual Person-Days:''' [[Actual_days::{{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Belongs to project::{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Actual_days::+]] [[Actual_days::*]]| format=sum| }}]] == Open Tasks related to {{PAGENAME}} == [[Category:Task]] [[Belongs to project::{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Category:*]] [[Status:=New||In Progress||Deferred]] [[Status:=*]] [[Priority:=*]] [[Completeness:=*|% Done]] [[Days to complete::*|Days Remaining (est.)]] [[Assigned to::*]] [[Target date:=+]] [[Target date:=*]] == Tasks completed related to {{PAGENAME}} == [[Category:Task]] [[Belongs to project::{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Status:=Completed]] [[Status:=*]] [[Priority:=*]] [[Completeness:=*|% Done]] [[Assigned to::*]] [[Target date:=+]] [[Target date:=*]] ----- [[Category:Project]]

[[Has default form::Form:Project]] The '''Project''' category is used to categorize projects CC works on... [[Category:Project]] == Add/Edit Project ==
{{#forminput:Project|35|Add/Edit Project|}}
== By Project == [[Category:Project]]
#REDIRECT [[Template:Project Group]]

__NOTOC__ = Projects =
{{#forminput:Project|35||Add Project|Project[category]={{PAGENAME}} }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Project]] [[Category:{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Days_to_complete::*]] [[Estimated_days::*]] [[Actual_days::*]]| mainlabel=Project| link="all" }} = Calendar = {{#semantic_calendar: Target date | [[Category:Task]] [[Category:{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Status::New||In Progress]] }} = Open Tasks =
{{#forminput:Task|35||Add Task|Task[category]={{PAGENAME}} }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Category:{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Status::*]] [[Status::New||In Progress]] [[Days_to_complete::*]] [[Assigned to::*]] [[Target date::*]] [[Tag::*]] | mainlabel=Task | sort=Status }} = Completed Tasks = {{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Category:{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Status::Completed||Cancelled]] [[Status::*]] [[Assigned to::*]] [[Days_to_complete::*]] [[Estimated_days::*]] [[Actual_days::*]] [[Tag::*]] | mainlabel=Task }} = Deferred Tasks = {{#ask: [[Category:Task]] [[Category:{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Status::*]] [[Status::Deferred]] [[Days_to_complete::*]] [[Assigned to::*]] [[Target date::*]] [[Tag::*]] | mainlabel=Task }} [[Category::Staff]] [[Category::{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Category:Project_Category]]
'''Projects:''' {{ #if: {{{1|}}} | {{#arraymap:{{{1}}}|,|x|[[Belongs to project::{{{1}}}]] }} | (none) }}

This is the 'Group' form; edit the page to see the source code. You can add data with this form [[Special:AddPage/Group|here]].

Group: {{{field|page title}}}

{{{for template|Email Widget|label=Email Adresses|multiple}}}

Email: {{{field|1|autocomplete on=Email}}}

{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Website Widget|label=Website URLS|multiple}}}

URL: {{{field|1|autocomplete on=Website}}}

{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Phone Widget|label=Phone Numbers|multiple}}}

Phone Number: {{{field|1|autocomplete on=Phone}}}

{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Contact Widget|label=Contacts|multiple}}}

Name: {{{field|1|autocomplete on=Contact}}}

Department: {{{field|3|autocomplete on=Department}}}

{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Staff Widget|label=CC Staff Contact|multiple}}}

Name: {{{field|1|autocomplete on=Staff}}}

{{{end template}}}
Free text {{{field|free text}}}

This is the 'Presentation' form. To add a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. You can add data with this form [[Special:AddPage/Presentation|here]]. {{{info|add title=Add Presentation|edit title=Edit Presentation}}} {{{for template|Presentation}}}

Title: {{{field|title}}}
Optional; defaults to the page title.

Date: {{{field|date|date}}}

Presented at: {{{field|event}}}

Category: {{{field|Category|autocomplete on namespace=Category}}}

Tags: {{{field|tags}}}

File: {{{field|file|autocomplete on namespace=Image}}}You must first [http://teamspace.creativecommons.org/Special:Upload upload] the file.

Ext Presentation URL: {{{field|MainURL}}}

{{{end template}}} '''Additional Information:''' {{{field|free text}}}

revision.comment: New page: [[Has default form::Form:Staff Contact]] The '''Staff Contact''' category is used to categorize [[Category:Staff]] == Add/Edit Staff == <div align="center"> {{#forminput:Staff Contact|3...
revision.text:
[[Has default form::Form:Staff Contact]] The '''Staff Contact''' category is used to categorize [[Category:Staff]] == Add/Edit Staff ==
{{#forminput:Staff Contact|35|Add/Edit Staff Member|}}
== Staff Contacts for Groups == [[Category:Group]] [[Is contact::*]] [[Staff contact is::*]]

[[Category:Staff]]
<noinclude> <!-- marking as such because it's not clear anyone's using this and we're not marking contacts this way in the tech realm -->
{{Contact}}
== Is Staff Contact for == <ask sort="Group" format="broadtable" limit="50" link="all" default="Is not the staff contact for any projects right now."> [[Category:Group]] [[Staff contact is::{{PAGENAME}}|User:{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Is contact::*]] </ask> </noinclude>
'''Staff Contact:''' [[Staff contact is::{{{1}}}]]
<noinclude> This is the form for adding a staff contact, which is derived from the normal Contact </noinclude> <includeonly> {{Form:Contact}} [[Category:Staff]] </includeonly>

[[Category:Contact]]
== Tasks with {{PAGENAME}} as Contact == <ask sort="Target_date" limit="50" link="all" default="No current tasks with this person as contact."> [[Category:Task]] [[Status:=New||In Progress]] [[Status:=*]] [[Priority:=*]] [[Completeness:=*|% Done]] [[Is contact::{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Assigned to::*]] [[Target date:=+]] [[Target date:=*]] </ask>

revision.comment: [[Relation:Belongs to]] moved to [[Property:Belongs to]]: Unifying properties
revision.text:
One or more [[has type::Type:Page|groups]] a user belongs to.
Has a [[Has default form::Form:Group]]

revision.comment: [[Relation:Belongs to department]] moved to [[Property:Belongs to department]]: Unifying properties
revision.text:
One or more [[has type::Type:Page|groups]] a user belongs to.
This is supposed to be a sub-type of Groups...
Has a [[Has default form::Form:Group]]

revision.comment: [[Relation:Belongs to project]] moved to [[Property:Belongs to project]]: Unifying properties
revision.text:
One or more [[has type::Type:Page|projects]] something is part of.
Has a [[Has default form::Form:Project]]

'''Division''' is an [[has type::Type:Enumeration|enumeration]] which describes the CC "category" a [[Template:Task|task]] is assigned to. Valid values:
* [[allows value:=Technology|Technology]] * [[allows value:=BizDev|BizDev]] * [[allows value:=Design|Design]] * [[allows value:=Operations|Operations]] * [[allows value:=Legal|Legal]] * [[allows value:=Learn|Learn]]
[[Has type::Type:Date]]

'''Completeness''' is an [[has type::Type:Enumeration|enumeration]] which describes the status of a [[Template:Task|task]]. Valid values:
* [[allows value:=0|0]] * [[allows value:=10|10]] * [[allows value:=20|20]] * [[allows value:=30|30]] * [[allows value:=40|40]] * [[allows value:=50|50]] * [[allows value:=60|60]] * [[allows value:=70|70]] * [[allows value:=80|80]] * [[allows value:=90|90]] * [[allows value:=100|100]]
#REDIRECT [[Attribute:Email]]
[[has type::Type:String]]
#REDIRECT [[Attribute:Phone]]
#REDIRECT [[Attribute:Website]]
[[has type::Type:Date]]
[[Has type::Type:Integer]]

'''Division''' is an [[has type::Type:Enumeration|enumeration]] which describes the CC "division" a [[Template:Task|task]] is assigned to. Valid values:
* [[allows value:=Core|Core]] * [[allows value:=CC|CC]] * [[allows value:=SC|SC]] * [[allows value:=Learn|Learn]]
[[has type::Type:Email]]
[[Has type::Type:Number]]
[[has type::Type:URL]]
[[has type::Type:URL]]

revision.comment: New page: This is a property of type [[Has type::String|String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value:=core]] * [[Allows value:=SC]] * [[Allows value:=ccLearn]]
revision.text:
This is a property of type [[Has type::String|String]].
The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value:=core]] * [[Allows value:=SC]] * [[Allows value:=ccLearn]]
This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]; it uses the [[Has default form::Form:CiviCRM Contact|CiviCRM Contact]] form for creating new entries.

revision.comment: New page: This is a property of type [[Has type::Annotation URI|Annotation URI]].
revision.text: This is a property of type [[Has type::Annotation URI|Annotation URI]].
This is a property of type [[has type::Type:Page]]. It uses the [[Has default form::Form:Contact]] form.
[[Has type::Page]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::String|String]].
The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value:=prospect]] * [[Allows value:=active]] * [[Allows value:=in process - contract negotiation]] * [[Allows value:=in process - proposal due]] * [[Allows value:=in process - proposal submitted]] * [[Allows value:=closed]]

revision.comment: [[Relation:Has role]] moved to [[Property:Has role]]: Unifying properties
revision.text:
One or more [[has type::Type:Page|roles]] a user has...

revision.comment: [[Relation:Is contact]] moved to [[Property:Is contact]]: Unifying properties
revision.text:

[[has type::Type:Date]]

[[has type::Type:Page]]

'''Status''' is an [[has type::Type:Enumeration|enumeration]] which describes the priority of a [[Template:Task|task]]. Valid values:
* [[allows value:=1]] * [[allows value:=2]] * [[allows value:=3]]
One or more [[has type::Type:Page|projects]] a task is assigned to.

revision.comment: [[Relation:Related group is]] moved to [[Property:Related group is]]: Unifying properties
revision.text:

Has a [[Has default form::Form:Group]]

revision.comment: [[Relation:Staff contact is]] moved to [[Property:Staff contact is]]: Unifying properties
revision.text:
One or more [[has type::Type:Page|staff contacts]] assigned to a task or group.
Has a [[Has default form::Form:Staff Contact]]
[[has type::Type:Date]]

'''Status''' is an [[has type::Type:Enumeration|enumeration]] which describes the status of a [[Template:Task|task]]. Valid values:
* [[allows value:=New|New]] * [[allows value:=In Progress|In Progress]] * [[allows value:=Completed|Completed]] * [[allows value:=Deferred|Deferred]] * [[allows value:=Cancelled|Cancelled]]
[[has type::Type:Page]]
[[has type::Type:Date]]
[[has type::Type:URL]]
